description:
The replacement goalie of the famous Saint Flower Garden School`s soccer team. He is very good friends with Yanagiba Kazuya, the captain of the team.
Yousuke enjoys teasing Momoko endlessly, whom he affectionately calls Momo-P (P is a suffix often added to the name of your lover or close friend), and Momoko often gets very mad and annoyed. Even so, it is apparent that they like each other alot.
name: Fuuma Yousuke
